documents.document: Today is going to be a long day... I probs won't get home til 1am tomorrow, this is what uni and work balance looks like...
I just saw a Hamilton bus and almost had a heart attack... This is real guys!! @HamiltonWestEnd
@michellevisage love you Michelle, hope you and the family are well x
@CynthiaEriVo I understand perfectly! Thank you for taking the time to speak to me. I really enjoyed your concert last night xx
@MagicalLorna Isn't it just?!! have you seen the whole clip of her making faces, its hilarious!
Literally me! I had no clue what going on today lol https://t.co/NhhEzIiZYp
@CynthiaEriVo I'm sorry for how this has escalated. I only want the best for you xxx
@calamityjane65 @Filmwrite @CynthiaEriVo Why lie Penny? for what purpose, you already had Cynthia's attention ... this is going overboard
@CynthiaEriVo @Filmwrite I admire your courage, but you are sharp tongued like me, words can come across as harsh instead of passionate
@CynthiaEriVo @filmwrite I hope you feel you have accomplished something in this argument and it was worthwhile ...
@CynthiaEriVo @Filmwrite please stop, this is breaking my heart. We want unity not fighting, this will not help
@CynthiaEriVo Cynthia, I love you but you do not need to defend or explain yourself to anyone, especially not for 30 mins
Thank you @CynthiaEriVo, that was truly magical. I hope our paths cross in NYC when I get there xx
Yep, this happened and I cried!! https://t.co/Ou3RzXMixJ
So excited to be seeing Cynthia Erivo tonight at her concert in Shoreditch, will be her last performance in London for a while
@CynthiaEriVo I cannot wait to see you perform! Xx
I finally measured my height, I'm 5ft3" ... 3 inches smaller than I thought I was, better change it on my CV #Shorty
I miss Glad Hand, she was a pretty cool, if not weird, chick
Listening to @ladygaga Joanne album, I can't wait til Gaga tours this album!
@RuPaul ... New Album ... Next Week .... YASSSS!! #YouBettaWerk!
I entered the Â£15 Front Row lottery to see @DreamgirlsLDN on @TodayTixUK! Enter: https://t.co/iTTCGOreoi.
@CynthiaEriVo @ConnieMMathison I love the play Lysistrata, i'm currently writing a musical loosely based on it
Going to see @CynthiaEriVo on Sunday and going to @LaganjaEstranja dance school next month!! :D
@MagicalLorna just remembered I still have your m+g ticket for Alyssa Edwards, let me know an email to send it to!
@CynthiaEriVo Also I'm working on 'I'm Here' for my graduate showcase and struggling to hit 'sing out', any technical tips that'll help?
@CynthiaEriVo As an actress, does having short hair affect your casting. I wanna get an undercut but I don't want it to inhibit my career
@iHartbeat How you doin' Hart? hope you are well, thinking of you xx
When the library has the score for The Color Purple #winning
Looking forward to being back at work today, it's been too long!,
@WendyWilliams I hope Brendan had a great day, your gift to him was so sweet, you've got such a great team! xx
I wish we had Wendy's, IHOP and In- N -Out Burger in the UK .. I would be such a fatty! We also need a Roscoe's Chiâ€¦ https://t.co/lKGFfpeZT9
My anxiety is sky high now ...
Slipped on the icy pavement this morning and banged my elbow, in a lot of pain but will have to get it checked out after uni, so irritated!
@missmcollins Finally I'm not the one who didn't like it!
@msannalucinda From one mug to another ;) You're gonna be just fine xxx https://t.co/6eksY134CG
@thejeffreymarsh also if you could answer them too, that would be great! xxx
Hi @thejeffreymarsh, I'm doing some research,could you RT these questions for me 1. What makes you different? 2. Who are you proud to be?

Two questions for anyone who dares to answer:
1. What makes you different? 2. Who are you proud to be?
@GNRailUK Good afternoon Amy, have a great day and don't let the fuckers get you down! #SundayPositivity
@MagicalLantern Are tickets available at the event or must they be bought online?
@michellevisagehow How do you cope with being teetotal at social events? I just don't find clubs fun anymore
Hey @itsarifitz, I am coming to LA in April for a few days (from UK), can I crash at yours? I'll pay you in food and good company! xx
@WVerkaik Can't wait to see you as Elphie!! Your first night is the 30th right? xx
Oh Hi there :) https://t.co/oHZGIxxJMm
WOW! Love it! https://t.co/qMEikyTMog
Tonight, ladies and gentleman, I am Juliet! (avec a blocked nose and sore throat but we'll role with it!). I'm sure Juilet gets colds
At Paragon Studios, ready to read some Shakespeare for some peeps
@michellevisage OMG you're sugar free now! I can just about cope with being dairy free and soy free!
Waking up at 6.30 to leave my house for 7 to get to uni ... probs the first time in 3 years lol
@CRoberts96 @HamiltonMusical Tickets go on general sale on the 30th at noon, they're actually affordable, Don't throw away your shot!
@Lin_Manuel OMFG! It's Meryl Streep! I am so jealous right now. Glad you're having a great day! x
@littleTara89 True, I might just close my eyes and press buy, its bound to be a good night!
@michellevisage I got tickets for Hamilton in London!! So excited!! You coming to see it in London this year? x
I'm so happy I could cry! #HamiltonLondon #JustYouFuckingWait!
Guess who's got tickets to see @HamiltonMusical (West End) their 22nd Birthday this year ... MEEEE! CAN'T WAIT!!
@brenda_edwards you and Dean Read helped me with my song 'Young Again' for The O2, honestly one of the best experiences of my life!!
OMG! FOR REAL! I'm gonna try my very best to get there on Saturday, can't wait to see you @brenda_edwards!! Can meeâ€¦ https://t.co/YY45DOl7EK
Is it crazy that I wanna spend Â£86 to see Whoopi Goldberg's stand up show at The O2... That woman gives me life!!
@ReadDavidCase @michellevisage Awww! You are guys are totally #relationshipgoals
@michellevisage I love @MannyMua733, he is my spirit animal <3
Jamming out to the Hamiton Mixtape while I write my dissertation #lovinglife
@BroadwayBlack ooh exciting! Can't wait!
ALL THE TIME ... LOL! #noshame https://t.co/nQsEjKNY89
If you're free, it would be great to see you there! X https://t.co/r3cvniWM2e
@red_casting thanks sweetie, I'll hopefully be at the launch on the 29th x
@MagicalLorna That was literally (litch) my face when I saw your Harry Potter photo with the rainbow hair, no joke #GAGGING!!
Me and Henry made lemon muffins and they are yummy!! https://t.co/Mz5437I9y2
@CynthiaEriVo This gave me life!!!! You are inspiring and I think your hair rocks! xx
The moment I realised I can actually use a mixed voice successfully!!
@MagicalLorna LOL! I didn't even notice, 'head over hills' makes perfect sense to me ðŸ˜‚
Early ish night for me as I am shattered!
@CynthiaEriVo I worked there as an usher and was part of the youth theatre group with Jan, Karlos and Serena
@CynthiaEriVo Hope I get to see you in London soon. We share a common place: Theatre Royal Statford East, that theatre means a lot to me too
@CynthiaEriVo Reading your tweets make me so emotional because I know just how much this means this whole experience means to you, so proud!
PMS is killing me this month, cramps, headache, vocal problems (yes thats a thing) + crying over every little thing!! #SorryLads #TMI #HELP!
@TMC247 What show is she in?
This is kinda genius! https://t.co/jwIA1Rzmoy
It's a good thing I don't have to sing today because I barely have a voice, deffo have to steam today
So sad that @BwayColorPurple is closing tonight and never go to see it! Happy Birthday @CynthiaEriVo and hopefully see you in London soon! x
@CynthiaEriVo @jeremypope @BwayColorPurple Have an amazing last show! Hope to see you back in London soon xx
@ShutUp_CHANEL Hi Chanel, I have sent you an email to your gmail account, would appreciate if you could read it. Thank you xx
Watching @jeffreestar videos makes me want to put a whole face of make up on for no reason
@JeffreeStar is Beauty Bay one of your official UK partners? Wanna make sure I get the real thing hunty! Loved the ELF video :) xx
@castingcalls1 @LaganjaEstranja never mind, its not a paid job but its a good idea! I'd listen to a Ganja Cannabis podcast for sure!
@castingcalls1 I think @LaganjaEstranja would be perfect for this!!!
YESSS! @michellevisage is on my tv! Looking fierce mama xxx
@michellevisage just turned the telly on to watch ya!
Best tweet of 2017 so far! https://t.co/41ro4ojGqo
@TheWeirdWorld The answer is 65, I remember doing these nonsense questions in school ...
Semester 2 of my final year and in the library working on my dissertation #OnTrack #LCMMT #HereWeGo

Happy New Year Bitches!
@michellevisage Happy New Year momma! See you next year ;)
Thank god for Jakeman's Honey and Lemon Soothing Sweets, soothing my throat and clearing my sinuses since the beginning of time
